Package dev.morphia.geo

Class GeometryShapeConverter.PointConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.morphia.converters.TypeConverter
      • dev.morphia.geo.GeometryShapeConverter
        • dev.morphia.geo.GeometryShapeConverter.PointConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimpleValueConverter
    Enclosing class:
    GeometryShapeConverter
    public static class GeometryShapeConverter.PointConverter
extends GeometryShapeConverter
    Defines a new PointConverter. This extends and therefore configures GeometryShapeConverter to provide the specific configuration for converting Point objects to and from MongoDB representations of the GeoJson.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class dev.morphia.geo.GeometryShapeConverter
